thread.title: Marquis Who's Who Honors Dr. Clinton L. Lee Jr. for Expertise in Fitness, Security and Military Operations
thread.title_full: Marquis Who's Who Honors Dr. Clinton L. Lee Jr. for Expertise in Fitness, Security and Military Operations

title: Marquis Who's Who Honors Dr. Clinton L. Lee Jr. for Expertise in Fitness, Security and Military Operations
text:
June 12, 2025
COLLIERVILLE, TN, June 12, 2025 /24-7PressRelease/ -- Dr. Clinton L. Lee Jr. has been selected for inclusion in Marquis Who's Who. As in all Marquis Who's Who biographical volumes, individuals profiled are selected on the basis of current reference value. Factors such as position, noteworthy accomplishments, visibility, and prominence in a field are all taken into account during the selection process.
Dr. Lee has established a distinguished career marked by leadership, dedication and a commitment to excellence. As the owner of CL3 Fitness and Wellness LLC, established in 2017, he leverages his passion for health and wellness to help promote healthier lifestyles to his clients by guiding them throughout their total fitness journey and simplifying their objectives so they can meet their needs.
Adding to his expertise, Dr. Lee has excelled as a senior physical security specialist with the U.S. Department of the Treasury since 2024. The treasury department is the executive agency responsible for promoting economic prosperity and ensuring the financial security of the U.S. In this role, Dr. Lee is responsible for ensuring the safety and security of critical assets. Furthermore, he currently serves as the vice president of operations at Regency Circle, a role that commenced in 2025, and he has been instrumental in its success. He has also been actively engaged as a creative consultant at Mentor Park, which showcases his multifaceted expertise.
Dr. Lee's career also includes significant contributions to education, including his appointments as the senior army instructor at Garner Magnet High School from 2018 to 2020 and at Memphis-Shelby County Schools between 2020 and 2023. These roles allowed him to impart his extensive military knowledge and leadership skills to students, fostering the next generation of leaders. Subsequently, Dr. Lee was the site director at ACTS-Aviation Security, a renowned safety, security and customer service company, from 2023 to 2024.
Beyond his civilian work, Dr. Lee's military service as a military police commissioned officer in the U.S. Army between 1997 and 2019 remains one of his proudest achievements. During his time in the military, he selflessly prioritized the country's needs over his own while demonstrating unwavering dedication and commitment to the United States. This experience laid the foundation for his expertise in executive leadership, health and wellness, and physical security.
Dr. Lee's academic accomplishments have played a pivotal role in his professional success. He earned a Bachelor of Arts in political science and sociology from the University of North Carolina at Greensboro in 1997, followed by a master's degree in business and organizational security from Webster University in 2001, a Master of Arts in human behavior from Columbia College in 2006, a master's degree in military arts from the U.S. Army Command and General Staff College in 2012, and a Doctor of Education in organizational leadership and organizational development from Grand Canyon University in 2023.
In addition to his work-related endeavors, Dr. Lee has been actively involved in civic organizations, such as the NAACP and the Boys & Girls Club of America, where he volunteers his time. Dr. Lee is a distinguished Life Member of Omega Psi Phi Fraternity Inc., where he has served as the Basileus (president) for five different chapters. Over his 25 years in the organization, he has been recognized as the Omega Man of the Year five separate times by three different chapters.
As an author, Dr. Lee published "365 Days to a Healthier You" in 2023, reflecting his commitment to promoting health and wellness on a broader scale. Looking ahead, he aims to expand CL3 Fitness and Wellness while collaborating with government entities to enhance public awareness of health issues. Through these efforts, Dr. Lee hopes to establish partnerships that will further his mission of fostering healthier communities.
Dr. Lee's contributions have been recognized with prestigious awards, including a Lifetime Achievement Award presented by President Barack Obama in 2012 and a Lifetime Achievement Award from Omega Psi Phi Fraternity Inc. in 2016. He attributes his success to the hard work instilled in him by his parents at a young age, the discipline gained from his military experience and his adherence to strong morals, values and ethics throughout his life.
About Marquis Who's Who®:
Since 1899, when A. N. Marquis printed the First Edition of Who's Who in America®, Marquis Who's Who® has chronicled the lives of the most accomplished individuals and innovators from every significant field of endeavor, including politics, business, medicine, law, education, art, religion and entertainment. Who's Who in America® remains an essential biographical source for thousands of researchers, journalists, librarians and executive search firms around the world. The suite of Marquis® publications can be viewed at the official Marquis Who's Who® website, www.marquiswhoswho.com.
